attributes.action: FineEngland players2 reimburse travelling fans when they embarrass their country
attributes.additional_details: England 1- 2 Iceland(struggled to even control a ball and string two passes together, considering they earn millions a year)
attributes.background: Year after year my national team under achieve when they represent their country. Tonight they have gone one further and instead of under achieve they have brought a ignominious defeat, they have wasted the time of everyone watching and wasted money to fans who have travelled to support them
